name: husky
description: Prevents bad commit or push (git hooks, pre-commit/precommit, pre-push/prepush, post-merge/postmerge and all that stuff...)

scripts.devinstall: npm run build && cross-env HUSKY_DEBUG=1 npm run _install -- node_modules/husky && node scripts/dev-fix-path
scripts.devuninstall: npm run build && cross-env HUSKY_DEBUG=1 npm run preuninstall -- node_modules/husky
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build && pinst --enable && pkg-ok
